topics.body:
Urgh, I can't believe I'm shipping Kite and Gon from HunterXHunter.
Kite used to be a dude but after he died and was devoured, he was reborn as a younger girl.

And Kite inspired Gon to be a Hunter. Before death, it's like a teacher-student relationship.
